Classes

class  FdoIFeatureCommand
 The FdoIFeatureCommand interface defines the behavior common to all commands that operate on feature instances. The features to be operated on are identified by their class and a filter. If the feature provider supports inheritance in the schema capabilities, then the command will operate on instances of that class and any derived classes. In addition, feature commands can operate on related features if one or more relation directives are specified. Each relation directive specifies the relation to follow and how many levels of depth to follow it. More...
